tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_influencers (
    influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(50),
    followers_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Brand_Promotions (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    promotion_type VARCHAR(50),
    promotion_content TEXT,
    promotion_date DATE,

    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Influential_Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE influencers (
    influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    followers_count INT,
    engagement_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE brands (
    brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    reputation_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    website_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE brand_influencers (
    brand_influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (brand_id, influencer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES brands(brand_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    issue_status VARCHAR(50),
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES brands(brand_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InfluentialUsers (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 followers_count INT NOT NULL,
 reputation_score FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Brands (
 brand_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 brand_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 industry VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
 post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID REFERENCES InfluentialUsers(user_id),
 post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
 post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE BrandPromotions (
 promotion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 brand_id UUID REFERENCES Brands(brand_id),
 user_id UUID REFERENCES InfluentialUsers(user_id),
 promotion_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 promotion_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerIssues (
 issue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID REFERENCES InfluentialUsers(user_id),
 issue_description TEXT NOT NULL,
 issue_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
